fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pink symbolizes love, innocence, and passion. Pink can visit a player to fill them with these emotions, which is announced the next day. These emotions will cause the target to refuse to carry out their action if their action results in any form of violence.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When visiting players that would normally kill Pink for visiting them, Pink will survive, even if their ability does not succeed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
